entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
Welcome Message!

Through me you go into a city of weeping; through me you go into eternal pain; through me you go amongst the lost people

  • Dante Alighieri, The Inferno

Let me flex a lil bit

I coded this blog becasue simply i was bored, and I wanted a blog. So in less than an hour I got this up and running.

Technical Details

Hosted by Github Pages, because I don’t wanna pay for a crappy host that I won’t use anyway, and the “Github.io” domain sits the nerdy theme for the blog.

Just another text

Okay, you got it now. I’m run outta ideas to write. Bye!
entry.summary: Welcome Message! Through me you go into a city of weeping; through me you go into eternal pain; through me you go amongst the lost people Dante Alighieri, The Inferno
